body.p: An entity classifies its financial liabilities as current when they are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period, even if:

li.p: the original term was for a period longer than twelve months, and
an agreement to refinance, or to reschedule payments, on a long‑term basis is completed after the reporting period and before the financial statements are authorised for issue.
